note:
DM me the word ‘bread’
If you are thinking of blocking me for whatever reason - I'm open to feedback, we might be able to hash something out, worst case scenario I'll know why you wanted to block me and maybe improve because of it.

I'm a pile of selfdeprecating barely sentient jello trapped in a cage of meat and bone.

Sometimes I manage to trick people into thinking I'm not a worthless drain on resources and might be of some worth to the society as a whole. And sometimes this pile of biomass can be tricked into thinking it's not miserable, alone and afraid. I don't think I deserve friends.

I'm trying to regain at least some of my lost self worth - and I feel like posting stuff on here and talking to people here has helped.

I sincerely hope meeting me did not make your day any worse.

I like playing video games,reading manwha/manga, watching anime and painting plastic minis.
I like programming stuff and do it for a living.
The idea of using Machine Learning professionaly scares me - but I find the topic itself interesting even if extremely confusing.

▖▘▖▖▘▘▘▖▌▘▖▌▌

Pls no minor, am not a good influence and I don't think I can be trusted to curate a safe feed.

fields.name: Hopes & Dreams
fields.value: To really think I'm actually worth talking to.

fields.name: Pronouns
fields.value: [Closed Beta Content] use they/them as a work around for now
